item.title: PlantUML: First Attempts
item.description: Let’s try out PlantUML PlantUML seems at first glance somewhat similar to Mermaid but with a wider function list.

item.title: Mermaid: First Attempts
item.description: Mermaid setup. Really basic first effort. I created a shortcodes folder under my theme layouts folder, adn there created a mermaid.
